Name: Cavebound
About the game: Cavebound is a game about working in a mine, and keeping the mine operational while avoiding a horrible monster. The aim of the game is to survive your shift in the mine without getting killed. Cavebound is both single player and co-op with up to 3 other players.
Meta Title: Cavebound: Mar 1, 2021, Ariel Spry and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cavebound? Check out the release date (Mar 1, 2021), developer insights from Ariel Spry, and a complete game summary.
